# Configuration Reference

Configuration constants and environment variables for xplat.

*Auto-generated by `xplat internal docs config`*

## Port Allocation

xplat uses the 876x port range for its services:

| Port | Service | Constant |
|------|---------|----------|
| 8760 | Web UI | `DefaultUIPort` |
| 8761 | Process Compose API | `DefaultProcessComposePort` |
| 8762 | MCP HTTP Server | `DefaultMCPPort` |
| 8763 | Webhook Server | `DefaultWebhookPort` |
| 8764 | Docs Server | `DefaultDocsPort` |

## Environment Variables

### Global xplat Home

| Variable | Default | Description |
|----------|---------|-------------|
| `XPLAT_HOME` | `~/.xplat` | Global xplat home directory |

### Project-Local Directories

| Variable | Default | Description |
|----------|---------|-------------|
| `PLAT_SRC` | `.src/` | Project source directory (cloned upstream code) |
| `PLAT_BIN` | `.bin/` | Project binary directory (built/downloaded binaries) |
| `PLAT_DATA` | `.data/` | Project data directory (databases, caches, logs) |
| `PLAT_DIST` | `.dist/` | Project dist directory (release artifacts) |

## Directory Structure

### Global Directories (`~/.xplat/`)

```
~/.xplat/
├── bin/           # Global binaries (cross-project)
├── cache/         # Downloaded taskfiles, package cache
├── config/        # User preferences, credentials
└── projects.yaml  # Local project registry
```

### Project Directories

```
plat-myproject/
├── .src/          # Cloned upstream source code
├── .bin/          # Built or downloaded binaries
├── .data/         # Runtime data (databases, logs)
├── .dist/         # Release artifacts
├── xplat.yaml     # Project manifest
└── Taskfile.yml   # Task definitions
```

## Task Runner Defaults

| Setting | Value | Description |
|---------|-------|-------------|
| Trusted Hosts | `github.com`, `raw.githubusercontent.com`, `gitlab.com` | Hosts that skip confirmation prompts |
| Cache Expiry | `24h0m0s` | How long to cache remote taskfiles |
| Timeout | `30s` | Timeout for downloading remote taskfiles |
| Failfast | `true` | Stop on first failure in parallel tasks |

## Default File Paths

| Constant | Value | Description |
|----------|-------|-------------|
| `DefaultTaskfile` | `Taskfile.yml` | Default Taskfile path |
| `ProcessComposeGeneratedFile` | `pc.generated.yaml` | Generated process-compose config |

### Process Compose Search Order

When looking for process-compose config, xplat searches in this order:

1. `pc.generated.yaml`
2. `pc.yaml`
3. `pc.yml`
4. `process-compose.generated.yaml`
5. `process-compose.yaml`
6. `process-compose.yml`
